title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. title: Tesla FSD finally makes driving obsolete. After years of delay, Tesla Full Self Driving can drive you to work while you work, play, or sleep
tuit: Autopilot is an advanced driver assistance system that assists your car with steering, accelerating and braking for : other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. It assists with the most burdensome parts of driving and work alongside i features like emergency braking, collision warning and 3 blind-spot monitoring.
